@@ -0,0 +1,39 @@
+SET XACT_ABORT ON;
+
+DECLARE @UpdateId NVARCHAR(100) = N'Update230210_CW0575-77354_Update504ProgramStatus';
+
+BEGIN TRANSACTION;
+
+INSERT INTO [iep].[Version]
+(
+    UpdateId
+)
+VALUES
+(@UpdateId);
+
+--CW0575-77354
+update sp set 
+    ProgramTypeStateValueId = 'F2C3FFC6-2EC7-426A-9BE2-CAF20423ABD9'  --Eligible With Plan
+from iep.FormFieldValue ffv
+    join iep.form f on f.FormId = ffv.FormId
+    join iep.Event e on e.EventId = f.EventId
+    join iep.EventGroup eg on eg.EventGroupId = e.EventGroupId
+    join iep.StudentPlan sp on sp.StudentPlanId = eg.StudentPlanId
+    join iep.LookupValue sps ON sp.ProgramTypeStateValueId = sps.LookupValueId
+where ffv.FormFieldDefinitionId = '33384F8F-8F72-4EAB-A609-ACD000EE550E'    -- Continued Section 504 Eligibility
+    and ffv.ValueBoolean = 1
+    and f.FormDefinitionId = '8896196C-A0E1-402B-A63A-ACD000EE530B'     --Committee Decision & Homebound Eligibility
+    and e.EventDefinitionId = '3244346B-430E-412F-AE60-47CE8116B3AD'    --§504 Re-Evaluation Meeting
+    and e.Status = 2    --Locked
+    and e.IsActive = 1
+    and e.ActualDate = (select max(e2.ActualDate) --Check that this event is the last locked
+                        from iep.Event e2
+                        join iep.EventGroup eg2 on eg2.EventGroupId = e2.EventGroupId
+                        join iep.StudentPlan sp2 on sp2.StudentPlanId = eg2.StudentPlanId
+                        where e2.CommonStudentId = e.CommonStudentId
+                        and e2.Status = 2 --Locked
+                        and e2.IsActive = 1
+                        and sp2.StudentPlanDefinitionId = sp.StudentPlanDefinitionId)
+    and sp.ProgramTypeStateValueId = '60212CB4-4869-4D32-9E38-198D5978926E' --Eligible With No Plan
+
+COMMIT TRANSACTION;
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -22346,3 +22346,61 @@ GO
 
 
 
+/************************************************************************************
+* DATE:       JIRA            Developer           Change/Revision
+----------    -------         ----------------    ----------------
+2023-02-13    CW0575-73228    N.Petrashkevich     Initial Creation
+************************************************************************************/
+
+CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dta.vStateReportingTexas 
+AS 
+
+select 
+       vst.[Common District],
+       vst.[District Name],
+       vst.[School Region Code],
+       vst.[Common School ID],
+       vst.[School ID],
+       vst.[School Name],       
+       vst.[Shared School Name],       
+       vst.[CommonStudentID],
+       vst.[Student ID],
+       vst.[Student Status],       
+       vst.[Student Name],
+       vst.[Gender],
+       vst.[Grade Level],       
+       vst.[Federal Ethnicity],
+       vst.[Race],
+       vst.[Races],
+       (case when vst.Races like '%Hispanic%' then 'Yes' else 'No' end) as [Hispanic Latino],
+       (case when vst.Races like '%Indian%' then 'Yes' else 'No' end) as [American Indian or Alaskan Native],
+       (case when vst.Races like '%Asian%' then 'Yes' else 'No' end) as [Asian],
+       (case when vst.Races like '%Black%' then 'Yes' else 'No' end) as [Black or African American],
+       (case when vst.Races like '%Hawaiian%' then 'Yes' else 'No' end) as [Hawaiian or Pacific Islander],
+       (case when vst.Races like '%White%' then 'Yes' else 'No' end) as [White],      
+       vst.[EligDis1],
+       vst.[EligDis2],
+       vst.[EligDis3],
+       vst.[Case Manager], 
+       10 as [Record Type],
+       r.EventName as [Event Name],
+       r.eventid as [Link ID],
+       cast(r.[EventScheduleDate] as date) as [Scheduled Date],
+       cast(r.[EventDueDate] as date) as [Due Date],
+       cast(r.[EventLockedDate] as date) as [Locked Date],
+       cast(r.EventPlanStartDate as date) as [Plan Start Date],
+       cast(r.EventPlanEndDate as date) as [Plan End Date],
+       i.IndicatorCode as [Section 504 Indicator Code],
+       id.Name as [Indicator Name],
+       i.IndicatorValue as [Value],
+       cast(i.IndicatorStartDate as date) as [Effective Date],
+       csy.SchoolYear
+from iep.StateReporting r
+join iep.StateReportingIndicators i on r.StateReportingID = i.StateReportingID
+join iep.StateReportingIndicatorDefinition id on id.StateReportingIndicatorDefinitionId = i.StateReportingIndicatorDefinitionId
+join dta.vStandardizedFields vst on vst.CommonStudentID = r.CommonStudentId
+join dbo.CommonSchoolYear csy on csy.CommonSchoolYearId = r.EventFiscalCommonSchoolYearID
+where r.StateReportingRecordType = 10
+;
+GO
+

+SET XACT_ABORT ON;
+
+DECLARE @UpdateId NVARCHAR(100);
+SET @UpdateId = N'Update230213_CW0575-77669_UpdateDates';
+
+BEGIN TRANSACTION;
+
+INSERT INTO
+    [iep].[Version] (UpdateId)
+VALUES
+    (@UpdateId);
+
+DECLARE @Author NVARCHAR(MAX) = N'echuchumakov_superadmin';
+DECLARE @Date DATETIME2 = GETDATE();
+
+-- specific New Braunfels
+
+  UPDATE [iep].[FormFieldValue]
+   SET [ValueDateTime] = '2023-03-07 00:00:00.000'
+  where [FormId] = '72cbd884-2fff-4f5f-8206-af1f01383e6f'
+  and [FormFieldDefinitionId] = 'a2ddc5f3-dab3-4dae-be96-abdd01102237'
+  and [FormFieldValueId] = 'A3FAA20A-B477-4534-9430-AF1F01383E6F'
+
+  UPDATE [iep].[FormFieldValue]
+   SET [ValueDateTime] = '2023-04-06 00:00:00.000'
+  where [FormId] = '72CBD884-2FFF-4F5F-8206-AF1F01383E6F'
+  and [FormFieldDefinitionId] = '8438B58B-4F5C-4137-96B8-ABDD01102229'
+  and [FormFieldValueId] = 'B09D9AE4-5283-4EEE-8A48-AF1F01383E6F'
+
+  UPDATE [iep].[Event]
+   SET [DueDate] = '2022-09-29 12:00:00.000'
+      ,[UpdatedBy] = @Author
+      ,[UpdatedDate] = @Date
+  where [EventId] = '365c23ab-9b93-4d4f-8923-af1f01383e5d'
+  and [EventDefinitionId] = '24D3AF2B-CB5E-498E-B5FF-C0354C322115'
+  and [DueDate] < '2010-01-01 00:00:00.000'
+
+  UPDATE [iep].[Event]
+   SET [DueDate] = '2022-12-09 12:00:00.000'
+      ,[UpdatedBy] = @Author
+      ,[UpdatedDate] = @Date
+  where [EventId] = 'C5C97257-2CA6-4094-98B7-AF6601122BD3'
+  and [EventDefinitionId] = 'BD24B034-7D3C-4DFB-8F6F-806711FD58B9'
+  and [DueDate] < '2010-01-01 00:00:00.000'
+  
+  UPDATE [iep].[Event]
+   SET [DueDate] = '2022-12-09 12:00:00.000'
+      ,[UpdatedBy] = @Author
+      ,[UpdatedDate] = @Date
+  where [EventId] = '6D202938-EF7E-4969-807C-AF66011F2798'
+  and [EventDefinitionId] = 'BD24B034-7D3C-4DFB-8F6F-806711FD58B9'
+  and [DueDate] < '2010-01-01 00:00:00.000'
+
+PRINT 'The database update succeeded.';
+COMMIT TRANSACTION;

@@ -22346,3 +22346,61 @@ GO
 
 
 
+/************************************************************************************
+* DATE:       JIRA            Developer           Change/Revision
+----------    -------         ----------------    ----------------
+2023-02-13    CW0575-73228    N.Petrashkevich     Initial Creation
+************************************************************************************/
+
+CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dta.vStateReportingTexas 
+AS 
+
+select 
+       vst.[Common District],
+       vst.[District Name],
+       vst.[School Region Code],
+       vst.[Common School ID],
+       vst.[School ID],
+       vst.[School Name],       
+       vst.[Shared School Name],       
+       vst.[CommonStudentID],
+       vst.[Student ID],
+       vst.[Student Status],       
+       vst.[Student Name],
+       vst.[Gender],
+       vst.[Grade Level],       
+       vst.[Federal Ethnicity],
+       vst.[Race],
+       vst.[Races],
+       (case when vst.Races like '%Hispanic%' then 'Yes' else 'No' end) as [Hispanic Latino],
+       (case when vst.Races like '%Indian%' then 'Yes' else 'No' end) as [American Indian or Alaskan Native],
+       (case when vst.Races like '%Asian%' then 'Yes' else 'No' end) as [Asian],
+       (case when vst.Races like '%Black%' then 'Yes' else 'No' end) as [Black or African American],
+       (case when vst.Races like '%Hawaiian%' then 'Yes' else 'No' end) as [Hawaiian or Pacific Islander],
+       (case when vst.Races like '%White%' then 'Yes' else 'No' end) as [White],      
+       vst.[EligDis1],
+       vst.[EligDis2],
+       vst.[EligDis3],
+       vst.[Case Manager], 
+       10 as [Record Type],
+       r.EventName as [Event Name],
+       r.eventid as [Link ID],
+       cast(r.[EventScheduleDate] as date) as [Scheduled Date],
+       cast(r.[EventDueDate] as date) as [Due Date],
+       cast(r.[EventLockedDate] as date) as [Locked Date],
+       cast(r.EventPlanStartDate as date) as [Plan Start Date],
+       cast(r.EventPlanEndDate as date) as [Plan End Date],
+       i.IndicatorCode as [Section 504 Indicator Code],
+       id.Name as [Indicator Name],
+       i.IndicatorValue as [Value],
+       cast(i.IndicatorStartDate as date) as [Effective Date],
+       csy.SchoolYear
+from iep.StateReporting r
+join iep.StateReportingIndicators i on r.StateReportingID = i.StateReportingID
+join iep.StateReportingIndicatorDefinition id on id.StateReportingIndicatorDefinitionId = i.StateReportingIndicatorDefinitionId
+join dta.vStandardizedFields vst on vst.CommonStudentID = r.CommonStudentId
+join dbo.CommonSchoolYear csy on csy.CommonSchoolYearId = r.EventFiscalCommonSchoolYearID
+where r.StateReportingRecordType = 10
+;
+GO
+
